name: Bit2Me
description: Receive, store, send, buy, sell, and use cryptocurrencies (such as Bitcoin or Ethereum) and traditional money easily, quickly, and securely. Bank 3.0? No, this is better! The Bit2Me freedom formula is: Cryptocurrencies + Traditional Money + Debit Mastercard Cryptocard + Shared IBAN + Payments between friends + Simple Exchanges.
